mapper.select: select count(*) from mate where status = 'Y' or status = 'R'

select mate_no, mate_writer, mate_title, count, recruit_status, to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date", local_name from mate join local using(local_code) where status = 'Y' or status = 'R' order by mate_no desc
select file_no, origin_name, change_name, local_board_no from com_attachment where mate_no = #{mateNo}

select mate_no, mate_title, mate_content, mate_writer, to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as "create_date", count, local_name, recruit_status, member_count, member_curcount, status, to_char(f_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "f_date", to_char(l_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "l_date" from mate join local using(local_code) where NOT status = 'N' and mate_no = #{mateNo}
mapper.insert: insert into mate ( mate_no, local_code, mate_writer, mate_title, mate_content ) values ( seq_mno.nextval, #{localCode}, #{mateWriter}, #{mateTitle}, #{mateContent} )
insert into com_attachment ( file_no, origin_name, change_name, local_board_no ) values( seq_fno.nextval, #{originName}, #{changeName}, seq_mno.currval )
mapper.update: update mate set status = 'N' where mate_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select reply_no replyNo, reply_writer replyWriter, reply_content replyContent, to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" from reply where ref_board_no = #{boardNo} and status = 'Y' or status = 'R' and reply_level = '2' order by reply_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_no, reply_content, ref_board_no, reply_writer, reply_level ) values ( seq_rno.nextval, #{replyContent}, #{refBoardNo}, #{replyWriter}, '2' )
mapper.update: update mate set count = count + 1 where mate_no = #{mateNo} and NOT status = 'N'
update mate set member_curcount = member_curCount + 1 where mate_no = #{boardNo} and NOT status = 'N'
